description.fr: Le prochain directeur de l'hôtel Woo Myung-sung a été élevé comme "œuvre d'art" par son père. Myong-sung, qui semblait parfait sous tous les aspects, était en fait en train de perdre sa motivation à vivre, épuisé par la pression qu'il avait endurée depuis son enfance. Puis un jour, Woo Myung-sung a rencontré un camarade du lycée qui distribuait du poulet. Je veux transmettre mes compétences en rendez-vous à Jeonsu, qui se réveille comme une poupée qu'il aime, change d'humeur et révèle honnêtement toutes ses émotions comme un idiot. "Essaye, embrasse, apprends."

description.en: An artist's boyfriend cheats on her. But she has the perfect revenge planned.

title.en: The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

altTitles.zh: 反派大师兄，师妹们全是病娇

altTitles.zh-ro: Fǎnpài Dà Shīxiōng, Shīmèimen Quán Shì Bìng Jiāo
Fanpai Da Shixiong, Shimeimen Quan Shi Bing Jiao

altTitles.en: The Big Villain Brother and the Junior Sisters Are All Sick and Delicate
The Great Villain Senior Brother and All of His Yandere Junior Sisters

altTitles.es-la: El Gran Villano Hermano Mayor y todas sus Hermanas Menores Yandere

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

A Twitter series about a handsome salaryman and an unapproachable office lady who dress completely different when they are off work.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/4729811/series/198059)

description.es-la: Los colegas con diferentes personalidades tienen una vida privada donde uno se viste como una lolita y el otro se viste como una persona funky goath.

description.en: Being an Elite Nanny is simple: protect the charge, obey the principle, and don’t get emotionally attached. Easier said than done when Davina’s first client is a dangerously compelling Venetian underboss who’s determined to get under her skin. What he wants from her, she can’t imagine, but Gabriel Angelini drags her back into the glittering world of organized crime she thought she’d left behind forever. She might get answers about her past if she digs deep enough, but can she protect Mikey from his father’s ambitions and keep her heart from getting tangled up in their treacherous web?

title.en: The Dungeon That Kills All Adventurers

altTitles.ja: 冒険者絶対殺すダンジョン

description.en:
Dungeons.
A romantic setting.
However, that’s only for adventurers.

Cleaning, replenishing supplies, and dealing with complaints.
Aine and Nacht work hard behind the scenes as floor staff in the dungeon.

Damn adventurers.

The dungeon staff now turns its fangs on the adventurers who gather together while not caring about the troubles of others!

The unique and exciting horror, fantasy of a different world begins!!

altTitles.en: I Want to See You Embarrassed

altTitles.ja: 恥じらう君が見たいんだ

altTitles.th: เทคนี้ที่ผมถ่ายเป็นเรื่องน่าอายที่เธอไม่คัท

altTitles.en: I Want To See You Blush

altTitles.zh-hk: 想看妳露出羞恥的模樣

description.en: Akito Shirasawa, a high school boy whose father is a film director, sees something in the library preparation room. It was the "masturbation scene" of his classmate, Kaho Honjou. Akito is puzzled, but ends up filming it with his smartphone. Kaho notices Akito, and in the men's restroom, makes a "proposal" to Akito! Exposed high school girl and movie boy. The "exposed love" of twisted adolescence, begins!
description.es-la: Akito Shirasawa, un chico de secundaria cuyo padre es director de cine, ve algo en la sala de preparación de la biblioteca. Era la "escena de la masturbación" de su compañera de clase, Natsuho Honjo. Akito está desconcertado, pero termina filmándolo con su teléfono inteligente. Natsuho nota a Akito, y en el baño de hombres, ¡le hace una "propuesta" a Akito! Chica de secundaria expuesta y chico de película. ¡Comienza el "amor expuesto" de la retorcida adolescencia!

altTitles.ja: あそこではたらくムスブさん

altTitles.th: คุณมุสุบุกับงานของเธอ

description.en: Sagami Gorou works in sales at Shounan Rubber Industries Co., Ltd. He is secretly harboring feelings for Musubu, a girl working in the company's integrated development department. And what this lovely young scientist is researching day and night are actually…
description.es-la: La historia sigue a Sagami Gouro de 24 años que empieza a trabajar en Industria Shounan Gum S.A, allí conocerá a la investigadora Musubu-san una chica que trabaja en el laboratorio de desarrollo de asistencia médica la "casa", su primer encuentro no será precisamente el esperado.
description.pt-br: Sagami Gorou trabalha no setor de vendas da Indústria de Borracha Shounan Ltda e tem guardado seus sentimentos por Musubu, uma garota que trabalha no departamento de desenvolvimento integrado, em segredo. O objeto de estudo desta adorável cientista, na verdade é…

title.en: I Accidentally Seduced the Male Lead's Younger Brother

altTitles.pt-br: Sem querer seduzi o caçula do reino

altTitles.ru: Я случайно соблазнила младшего брата главного героя

altTitles.ja: 間違って男主人公の弟を口説いちゃった

altTitles.id: Tidak sengaja menggoda adik male lead

altTitles.zh: 不小心勾引了男主的弟弟

altTitles.es: No quise cautivar al hermano menor del protagonista masculino

altTitles.vi: Tôi Đã Vô Tình Quyến Rũ Em Trai Của Nam Chính

description.en:
She possessed the mistress of the male lead in an R19 novel. In the original novel, the male lead was trash who abandoned her after getting her pregnant, saying that he belatedly realized that he loved the heroine. Fortunately, it was still before the original work started. She decided to scrap that shit herself.

"No, I don't want to," she flatly rejected Killian's offer to have an affair with him.

When he asked her why, she smiled brightly and answered, "Young Master is not my taste. If I must say, your younger brother is much preferable.”

"What? You prefer my younger brother?"

*Yeah. Not you, but your brother.*

Unlike the original, she firmly set up an iron wall, took care of Lexion, the younger brother who was abused by his elder brother, and protected the original female lead who had low-esteem from that shitty male lead.

And now that she'd already done what she had to do, she's off to go.

But a few years later–

Lexion, who had pushed out his older brother and taken the ducal title, came back to her as a beast with a decadent beauty. On top of that, he was even holding the engagement document that she had signed as a joke during their childhood.

"I've never forgotten you for a moment. Please marry me, Noona."

*No, wasn't that just for playing house?*

Every time she refuses his marriage proposal, he gently hugs her around the waist, and asks in a cold voice, "Did your taste change while I was away?"

Lexion's eyes were full of life as he asked.

It was as if when he found out who her type was, he'd kill them right away.

---
**Official Translations:**

* [Japanese / 日本語](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/146753)
* [Portuguese (Brazilian) / Português brasileiro](https://br.comikey.com/comics/sem-querer-seduzi-o-cacula-do-reino-webtoon/709/)
description.es:
“No, no quiero.”

La propuesta fue rechazada como un golpe en seco.

“Confucio no es de mi agrado. Mi preferencia es el hermano menor de Confucio”.

“¿Qué? ¿A mi hermana le gusta?”

“Así es. No tú, sino tu hermano.”

===

Ese ‘hermano menor’ vino a nosotros como una bestia con una belleza trascendental. 

“Nunca te he olvidado ni por un solo momento. Por favor, cásate conmigo, hermana.”

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9842)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/146753)
* [Portuguese (Brazilian) / Português brasileiro](https://br.comikey.com/comics/sem-querer-seduzi-o-cacula-do-reino-webtoon/709/)
description.id:
Dia memiliki kekasih dari pemeran utama pria dalam novel R19. Dalam novel aslinya, pemeran utama pria adalah sampah yang mencampakkannya setelah membuatnya hamil, mengatakan bahwa dia terlambat menyadari bahwa dia mencintai pahlawan wanita tersebut. Untungnya, itu masih sebelum pekerjaan aslinya dimulai. Saya memutuskan untuk menghapus omong kosong ini sendiri. *** "Tidak, aku tidak mau". Aku dengan tegas menolak tawaran Killian untuk berselingkuh dengannya. Ketika dia bertanya mengapa, saya tersenyum cerah dan menjawab. “Tuan Muda tidak sesuai dengan seleraku. Jika saya harus mengatakan, adik laki-laki Anda jauh lebih disukai. ” "Itu? Apakah kamu lebih suka adik laki-lakiku?" "Ya. Bukan kamu, tapi kakakmu." *** Berbeda dengan aslinya, saya dengan kuat membangun tembok besi, merawat Lexion, adik laki-laki yang dilecehkan oleh kakak laki-lakinya, dan melindungi pemeran utama wanita asli yang memiliki harga rendah terhadap pemeran utama pria yang tidak bermutu itu. Dan sekarang setelah saya melakukan apa yang harus saya lakukan, saya akan pergi. Namun beberapa tahun kemudian, Lexion, yang melewati kakak laki-lakinya dan duduk di kursi sang duke, kembali kepadaku seperti binatang buas dengan kecantikan dekaden. Selain itu, dia bahkan memegang dokumen jaminan yang saya tandatangani sebagai lelucon saat masih kecil. “Aku tidak pernah melupakanmu sedetik pun. Tolong menikahlah denganku, noona.” Tidak, bukankah itu hanya untuk bermain rumah? Setiap kali saya menolak lamaran pernikahannya, dia dengan lembut memeluk pinggang saya dan bertanya kepada saya dengan suara yang begitu dingin. "Apakah seleramu berubah saat aku pergi?" Mata Lexion penuh dengan kehidupan saat dia bertanya. Ini seperti ketika dia mengetahui siapa tipeku, dia akan langsung membunuhnya.

---
**Official Translations:**

description.ru:
Обычный офисный работник перевоплотился в романе 18+ в второстепенного персонажа, который изначально был любовницей главного героя. В оригинальном романе главный герой бросил ее после того, как она забеременела, сказав, что запоздало понял, что любит главную героиню. Теперь у нее есть шанс изменить судьбу этого персонажа и отказать главному герою: «Я на это не соглашусь!»

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9842)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/146753)
* [Portuguese (Brazilian) / Português brasileiro](https://br.comikey.com/comics/sem-querer-seduzi-o-cacula-do-reino-webtoon/709/)
description.vi:
Tôi đã sở hữu cơ thể người yêu của nam chính trong một cuốn tiểu thuyết 19+. Trong nguyên tác, nam chính đích thị là một tên rác rưởi. Anh ta đã vứt bỏ cô sau khi làm cô có thai, còn bonus thêm câu anh ta đã vô tình rơi vào lưới tình của nữ chính. May thay, hiện giờ nguyên tác chưa bắt đầu. Vậy nên, tôi đã quyết định tự mình loại bỏ tên rác rưởi đó. *** “Không thích” Tôi đã nhanh chóng từ chối lời đề nghị làm người yêu từ Killian. Anh ta muốn hỏi tôi lý do với khuôn mặt đầy dấu chấm hỏi, tôi chỉ nhẹ nhàng nở nụ cười rạng rở và trả lời. “Thiếu gia đây không phải gu tôi. Gu tôi chính là em trai của thiếu gia cơ” “Gì? Em thích em trai của ta?” Chính xác rồi đó anh trai. Không phải anh, mà là em trai của anh cơ. *** Không như nguyên tác, tôi đã xây dựng một bức tường thành chắc chắn nhằm ngăn chặn tên thiếu gia kia. Bắt đầu chăm sóc cho Lexion, người bị anh trai của mình ngược đãi và cũng chính là người đã bảo vệ nữ chính. Và khi đã hoàn thành công việc, tôi đã nhanh chóng tẩu thoát khỏi dinh thự công tước. Nhưng trôi qua mấy năm. Lexion, người đã đẩy cái tên khốn kia ra khỏi vị trí công tước và tự mình ngồi chễm chệ trên vị trí đó đã trở thành một con thú và đến tìm tôi. Đồng thời còn mang theo một tờ giấy đính hôn có sẵn chữ ký như trò đùa khi nhỏ. “Em chưa hề quên chị dù chỉ một phút. Chị kết hôn với em nhé” Điều đó chẳng phải chỉ để con nít chơi với nhau à? Mỗi lần từ chối, anh ta lại bắt đầu quấn lấy eo của tôi mà ôm. Quá mệt mỏi, tôi đã hỏi anh ta với vẻ mặt nghiêm túc. “Chẳng lẽ em đã thay đổi gu trong thời gian chị vắng mặt?” Đôi mắt của Lexion chứa đầy sát khí khi tôi cất lời. Cứ như thể khi anh ta phát hiện ra gu của tôi là ai, anh ta sẽ giết người đó ngay lập tức.

---

description.zh:
“公爵不是我喜欢的类型，我喜欢的是公爵您的弟弟。” 果断拒绝油腻海王公爵的的提议，这一世我不会做你的情人，没想到随便使用的借口，却让对方上了心。那个小软萌弟弟长大后居然变成了一个病娇美男？“姐姐不是说喜欢我吗？”这个婚约该怎么拒绝呀！

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9842)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/146753)
* [Portuguese (Brazilian) / Português brasileiro](https://br.comikey.com/comics/sem-querer-seduzi-o-cacula-do-reino-webtoon/709/)
description.pt-br:
**“Jovem mestre, você não faz o meu tipo… Eu quero o seu irmão!”**

“Você não faz o meu tipo, jovem mestre. Prefiro muito mais o seu irmão mais novo.”
“O quê? O meu irmão?”
“Isso mesmo, o seu irmão, não você.”

===
 Quando criança, eu assinei um contrato de casamento com este “irmão mais novo”, eu só não contava que…
“Eu nunca me esqueci de você, por favor, case-se comigo!”
Ele disse isso enquanto segurava o contrato que foi assinado quando éramos crianças, mas espera… não era tudo apenas uma brincadeira??!

---
"Não." Rejeitei categoricamente a oferta do canalha de ter um caso comigo. “O jovem mestre não é meu tipo. Meu tipo é seu irmão.” "O quê? Meu irmão é o seu tipo?" Garfos. Não você, mas seu irmão. * * * O 'irmão' veio até mim, uma fera da decadência. “Nunca me esqueci de você nem por um momento, quero que se case comigo, irmã.” Segurando os papéis de noivado que assinei de brincadeira na minha infância. Não, isso não era para uma brincadeira de criança? "Você mudou seus gostos enquanto eu estava fora?" Os olhos de Lexion estavam cheios de emoção quando ele perguntou. É como se ele soubesse do meu novo gosto, ele me mataria imediatamente.

---

title.en: Today Once Again, the Assassin Cannot Win Against the Girl He Picked Up!

altTitles.ja-ro: Kyou mo Ansatsusha wa Hirotta Dorei Shoujo ni Nakanaka Katenai

altTitles.ja: 今日も暗殺者は拾った奴隷少女になかなか勝てない

description.en: An assassin decided to bring home a slave girl from a mission to raise her to be an assassin.

title.en: Sekai Saikyou no Majo, Hajimemashita ~Watashi Dake "Kouryaku Saito" o Miseru Sekai de Jiyuu ni Ikimasu~

altTitles.ja: 世界最強の魔女、始めました ～私だけ『攻略サイト』を見れる世界で自由に生きます～

altTitles.en: I Became the World's Strongest Witch: I Will Live Freely in a World Where Only I can Access the "Guide Site"
The World's Strongest Witch Has Begun - I Will Live Freely In A World Where Only I Can View The "Strategy Site" -

description.en:
An unknown skill turns into unlimited power with divine knowledge [Internet]!

"To manifest an SSS rank with the weakest skill is a disgrace!"

Rona is a girl who was expelled from her home due to her lack of money, food, and power. Lost and hopeless, she suddenly hears the words...

"Would you like some guidance?"

She discovers how to utilize her unique SSS rank skill: [Internet], which she alone possesses. The true nature of this skill is the ability to access this world's 'guide sites' - an extraordinary cheat skill! Endless production of valuable items! Acquiring ultra-rare equipment! Thanks to her skill, she can do as she pleases...!
description.ja:
「…攻略うぃき？」――最弱クラスのスキルを発現してしまい追放された少女・ローナ。しかしそのスキルの正体は、この世界の『攻略サイト』を見ることができるＳＳＳランクのチートスキル【インターネット】だった！

（１）冒険開始→（２）即・最強武器発見→（３）世界を混乱に陥れる最強少女に‥‥‥。ローナは言う。「私はただ、平和に自由に生きたいだけなのにいぃ‥‥‥！」

altTitles.en: A Complicated Older Sister and Younger Brother 4-Koma

description.en:
"Big Sis!?"
"Kouta!?"


The two of them were enjoying an in-game romance (without knowing each other's identities). Upon seeing each other's faces at their long-awaited offline meetup... they were both shocked to see that their partner was in fact their own sibling!?

These are complicated feelings for sure... and rather hard to accept!

(Source: Kadokawa)

---

* [Kadokawa](https://store.kadokawa.co.jp/shop/g/g322302001578/) (Publisher)
* [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/20068503/vol_no/001)
description.ja:
「姉ちゃん!?」
「康太!?」

＊

ゲーム内で恋愛を楽しんでいたふたり。
待ちに待ったオフ会で顔を合わせたら……相手はまさかの姉弟で!?
複雑なこの感情……なかなか飲み込むのは難しい！

ＳＮＳで話題のカオス展開ラブコメが、 描き下ろしを加えて待望の書籍化!!

description.en: Aang, the strongest human warrior on the verge of death, has inexplicably travelled 60 years into the past, with the double-edged sword of the “strongest demon” power hidden inside him. “The only way to escape the fate of the pastis to evolve. Aang: “Don’t let yourself be a slave to your limits, break free and become a demon that reigns!

Haruka is a writer who is overwhelmed by deadlines and takes time out of her busy schedule to reset her mind. Strolling around the neighborhood, soaking in the public bath, eating the local cuisine, enjoying the park... even though she can’t take a big vacation or travel far, she’s determined to still enjoy any little “vacation” she can by getting creative!
description.ja: 締め切りに追われる作家のはるかが、忙しい毎日の合間を縫ってわずかな時間で気持ちをリセット。ご近所散策、銭湯、近場グルメ、公園満喫…まとまった休みが取れなくても、遠くへ旅行に行けなくても、少しの発想の切り替えで、ワクワクできる「休み」は満喫できる! 休みが足りないすべての人に、はるかがステキな休日を贈ります!

description.en: In 1946, someone discovered an island where dinosaurs had survived into the present. Through breeding and genetic manipulation, humans managed to increase their population and supercharge their popularity! Until, well... the unfortunate accident, when people's attitudes soured on the idea of visiting dinosaurs. This story follows a rookie zookeeper who is newly hired at Enoshima Dinoland, a struggling dinosaur sanctuary, and the fascinating creatures who need specialized love and care!

This is a test that puts your life at stake. Pass the test and survive. When the two-faced examiner Qin Jiu meets the cold examinee You Huo, the two amnesiacs are put head to head in a fight by the inhumane system. However, they form a tactic agreement. The system collapses after a series of warnings and the erased memories gradually become clearer. It turns out that at the end of this smoke-filled world, you are still the first person I met. The world is brilliant and grand. Welcome home.
A whole new THE iDOLM@STER branch - Gakuen THE iDOLM@STER. This comic introduces about characters and stuff in Hatsuboshi Academy.
description.vi: Một nhánh THE iDOLM@STER hoàn toàn mới - Gakuen THE iDOLM@STER. Truyện giới thiệu về các nhân vật và những điều liên quan đến Học viện tư lập Hatsuboshi.

title.en: I Stole the First Ranker’s Soul

altTitles.en: I Stole the Number One Ranker's Soul

description.en:
One day, Son Mo-Ah fell into a dungeon and became a gathering hunter.
Son Mo-Ah, who somehow narrowly escaped death, was going to live a normal life but gets caught up in a dungeon yet again.
In a moment of crisis, she is rescued by Seo Ji-Han, the number one ranker, and succeeds in surviving the situation. Somehow, Son Mo-Ah got entangled in a fateful relationship with said number one ranker.

But he said something really unusual to me.

“Promise me that you will kill all the dungeons bosses in this world, as many as you can.”

What?

Gen Suzuki, a young man who grew up in an orphanage, is trying to live an honest life.  
But when the cruel reality of the 10 million yen debt from her sister hits him, he decides to rob a Dark Casino.  
What awaits him is the baptism of the underworld!
A complicated web of relationships between two sets of childhood friends. How can all of them reach their happily ever after?

title.en: After Becoming Everyone's Favorite, I Went on a Killing Spree

altTitles.zh: 成为团宠后，我大杀四方

description.en: Growing up as an orphan in the arena, Ora was determined to awaken her summoner bloodline and gain immense power. However, her world turns upside down when she learns that the king has taken her loyal companion, Dragong, putting him in grave danger. In a daring escape, Ora and Dragong flee together, embarking on a series of thrilling adventures. Along the way, Ora hones her strength and resilience, while meticulously planning her revenge against those who have wronged her.

The Goddess of War died with grievances. Now after being reborn as Ye Weiyun she is on her way to start a new and happy life.   
  
What revenge? What scum? Violence should be fought with violence!   
  
I will become a rich woman, and build my own harem.   
  
"In the past I got bullied and never resisted. Now, take a good look at the queen I have become."

[Alternative Official Raw: Kuaikan Manhua](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/5975)

A storm of the universe brought species mutations. The poison, undead, giants and monsters in the city roared as they waved their weapons. As the beasts in the woods fought over territorial rights, humans, too, awakened an ability known as star power… Zhou Zheng, without star power, traversed to this apocalyptic world. Using the abilities of the thief character in the game, he destroys the darkness and fog, seeking supreme power!
description.fr:
Un mouvement dans l'univers a apporté des mutations au niveau des espèces vivantes. Un poison, des morts vivants, des géants et des monstres rugissent dans la ville en agitant leurs armes. Alors que des bêtes dans les bois se battent pour des territoires, certains humains éveillent une capacité spéciale connue sous le nom de pouvoir des étoiles... Zhou Zheng, déficient de ce pouvoir, va traverser ce nouveau monde post apocalyptique.
Utilisant ses capacités de voleur issue d'un autre jeu, il détruit ténèbres et brouillard, à la recherche du pouvoir suprême !
description.zh: 一场宇宙风暴带来了物种的变异。城市中的毒尸巨怪，挥动着战斧咆哮。丛林中的异兽们，争夺着领地的主权。人类也觉醒了一种名为星力的异能……没有星力的周正穿越到这个末世。利用游戏中盗贼的角色能力，他将撕毁黑暗迷雾，追逐至高的力量！

altTitles.zh: 我成了反派大佬的小娇妻

description.en: The dainty flower idol Chen Cong Rong unluckily fell into a trap and awoke to a stunning naked man in her bed! Hahaha, is it okay to be with such a beautiful man? Hang on… Are you telling me I've switched places with the toxic, evil, and manipulative side character who won’t even survive 20% of the plot?! No, I'm definitely not ready to die!! Watch as I keep on living my ideal life!
Ukiyo Meguru is in love with his childhood friend, Tatsumi Sara. One day, he meets a white snake that can "see the future"...!?
description.pt-br: Ukiyo Meguru que está apaixonado pela sua amiga de infância, Tatsumi Sara, um dia encontra uma cobra branca que diz "eu posso ver o futuro...!?"

altTitles.pt-br: A Bruxa gênia perdeu seu MP

altTitles.vi: Nàng Phù Thủy Thiên Tài Hết Mana Rồi!

description.en: Nayu, the one in a million genius witch who has been the talk of the town, has run out of magic! The price for all the things she has been allowed to do because of her brilliance is coming back to the former genius witch like a boomerang... Then, she meets her past student "Komugi" who loves her very much. This is a boomerang love comedy of karmic retribution by a former genius witch who can't be left alone even though it stings a little, abandoned by her magical powers!
description.pt-br: Nayu, aquela em um milhão de bruxas geniais que tem sido o assunto da cidade, ficou sem magia! O preço por todas as coisas que ela foi autorizada a fazer por causa de seu brilhantismo está voltando para a ex-bruxa genial como um bumerangue... Então, ela lembrou de seu ex-aluno "Komugi", que a ama muito. Esta é uma comédia de amor de retribuição cármica por uma ex-bruxa genial que não pode ser deixada sozinha, mesmo que doa um pouco, abandonada por seus poderes mágicos!

title.en: Honobono Isekai Tensei Days ~Level Counterstop, Item Mochikoshi! Watashi wa Saikyou Youjo Desu~

altTitles.ja: ほのぼの異世界転生デイズ ~レベルカンスト、アイテム持ち越し! 私は最強幼女です~

description.en: A young girl dies on Christmas day and is reincarnated into the world of her favorite game as her player character!
description.ja: 元・引きこもり女子高生のレニは大好きだったゲームの世界に転生してしまう。なんとその転生先はとってもキュートな最強幼女!? しかもカンストしたレベルやアイテムは前世から持ち越された”無敵”の状態で…。

altTitles.ja: ビートアンドモーション

description.en: The winner of the MILLION TAG manga competition! A new era of manga begins with this series about the struggle and joy of creating art. Anime and music collide in this new series about growing up and reaching for your dreams!

Born to a mother who was sealed in a mysterious ark with ten longevity on it, Arachi, who has tremendous power, hides her power and is now the wife of HS group and an ordinary housewife. While leaving for Gangwon-do with her family, they got hit by a truck and her two sons Soo-hyuk and Seon-mi were seriously injured and lost consciousness. In order to protect her precious family, Arachi borrows the status of Sunmi, instead of Hwang Shin-hye, and awakens her past power to find the person behind the attack. Arachi, she’s coming out into the world!

altTitles.fr: Petit ami de temps en temps petite amie

description.en: Akizuki Hodaka, a high school student just turned 17, met the school’s madonna, Shishizaki Chihaya due to a certain turn of events. Prepared to be shot down, he gambled it all by telling her 'I love you. Please go out with me!' And that how they started going out. But Chihaya has a secret Hodaka cannot even imagine…? A kind of love changes everything. The curtain raises on a new frontier in shonen love comedy!

title.en: My Childhood Friend Is Acting a Bit Weird

altTitles.ja: 幼なじみがちょっと変

altTitles.en: My Childhood Friend Is Acting a Bit Weird

title.en: Ken to Mahou to Gakureki Shakai

altTitles.ja: 剣と魔法と学歴社会 ～前世はガリ勉だった俺が、今世は風任せで自由に生きたい～

altTitles.en: Sword, Magic and Academic Society ~ I Was a Diligent Student in My Previous Life, but in This Life I Want to Live Freely and Leave the Wind in My Sails

description.en:
In this life, I will live doing only what I want to do!

Boku is reincarnated as "Allen", the third son of a noble family, in a different world of swords and magic, which he had longed for. However, this other world is a world where "academic background," which I was bound to in my previous life, is more important than anything else! I am no longer bound by my academic background. In this life, I will live freely and let the wind blow my way!
I decided to do as I pleased, but for some reason I became the center of attention everywhere I went..?!

This is the start of a painful fantasy in which you can enjoy your freedom in a different world!

Sora, a Japanese boy who was summoned to another world, gained the skill "Walking." Its effect is that "no matter how much he walks, he never gets tired." Because of this weak skill, the king expelled him from the group of summoned heroes. But when Sora starts walking in another world, he suddenly levels up!
 
Walking had a hidden effect of "gaining 1 EXP for each step taken." He acquired useful skills such as 'Appraisal,' 'Alchemy,' and healing magic...

Getting one skill after another, he became talented just by walking! The adventure to encounter and touch the unknown is about to begin!
description.pt-br:
Sora, um garoto japonês que foi convocado para outro mundo, ganhou a habilidade “Caminhar”. Seu efeito é que “não importa o quanto ande, ele nunca se cansa”. Por causa dessa habilidade fraca, o rei o expulsou do grupo de heróis convocados. Mas quando Sora começa a andar em outro mundo, ele subitamente sobe de nível!

Caminhar tinha um efeito oculto de “ganhar 1 EXP para cada passo dado”. Ele adquiriu habilidades úteis como 'Avaliação', 'Alquimia' e magia de cura...

Adquirindo uma habilidade após a outra, ele se tornou talentoso apenas andando! A aventura de encontrar e tocar o desconhecido está prestes a começar!

description.en:
A legend spreading among the whole universe says whoever collects Zaha Sanko's bones will have any kind of wish granted. 
Thus, he and his skeletal buddy Avakian will use their dark powers to fend off any murder attempts while they search through 
space for whoever put this curse on Sanko’s bones: killing them might end the madness.
description.ru: С самого детства Заха Санко боролся за свою жизнь. Как гласят легенды, если вы завладеете костями Захи Санко, вам исполнится любое желание. Вместе со своим другом Авакяном и силой тьмы Заха путешествует по космосу, чтобы найти человека, который проклял его кости и положил конец их жизни.

description.en: Middle-schoolers Youhei and Matsuno are taking remedial classes over the summer when their teacher informs them of an extraterrestrial-in-origin fire broken out on the nearby mountain! What chaos will ensue, and what will Youhei do to ensure the protection of his best friend?

title.en: Ore no Shibou Flag ga Todomaru Tokoro wo Shiranai

altTitles.en: My Death Flags Show No Sign of Ending

altTitles.zh: 不知我的死亡flag将于何处停止

altTitles.ja: 俺の死亡フラグが留まるところを知らない

altTitles.fr: Des risques mortels n'arrêtent pas de m'arriver

description.en:
When he came to his senses, Hirasawa Kazuki, a normal university student, found himself in possession of the body of a game’s character. Moreover, it was Harold Stokes, the story’s most hated character who was even given the title『King of Trash』by the players. Myriads of landmines are just waiting for him to step on them, like death flags!  
  
Will Harold be able to clear the survival route while avoiding the countless death flags in his way?!
description.fr: Lorsqu'il reprend ses esprits, Hirasawa Kazuki, un étudiant universitaire normal, se retrouve en possession du corps du personnage d'un jeu. De plus, c'est Harold Stokes, le personnage le plus détesté de l'histoire, qui a même été baptisé 『Roi des connards』par les joueurs. L'histoire est un terrain miné qui n'attend que lui pour exploser ! Harold pourra-t-il se dégager un chemin de survie tout en évitant les innombrables "mines" de l'histoire ? Des myriades de mines attendent qu’il les écrase, comme des drapeaux de mort (Game Over)!

description.en:
Sesame saves Rice Cake in the park, and they part ways. Rice Cake saves Sesame in the park, and this time, they become friends after Rice Cake's owner takes in Sesame. They become friends, but will that friendship progress to something more? Oh, and they're cats. GL series, infrequent updates (translator made description)  
Author Weibo: <https://www.weibo.com/xllb0118?refer_flag=1005055013_&is_all=1>

title.en: Genjitsu Sekai (Real) Demo Shiawase ni Shite Kudasai ne?

altTitles.ja: 現実世界（リアル）でも幸せにしてくださいね？

altTitles.es-la: Sé feliz también en el mundo real, ¿de acuerdo?

altTitles.en: Be Happy in the Real World Too, Okay?

altTitles.ja-ro: Genjitsu Sekai Demo Shiawase ni Shite Kudasai ne?
Genjitsu Sekai (Real) Demo Shiawase ni Shite Kudasai ne?

description.en:
High school student Machino, who longs for the 'love of destiny', encounters the dating simulation game 'Celestia'. Despite having maximized affection with all the heroines, she can't decide on just one, leading her to spend days of anguish unable to advance to the confession event. At that moment, an explosion along with a shooting star occurs in her house, and when she opens her eyes, she meets the main heroine of 'Celestia', Sofia....

"Machino... I always wanted to say it... I like you."

The otherworldly harem summoning romantic comedy begins with the highly affectionate heroines who have jumped into the real world!
description.es-la:
La estudiante de secundaria, Machino, que anhela el 'amor del destino', se encuentra con el juego de simulación de citas 'Celestia'. A pesar de haber aumentado al máximo la simpatía de todas las heroínas, no puede decidirse por una sola, lo que la lleva a pasar días de angustia sin poder avanzar al evento de confesión. En ese momento, una explosión junto con una estrella fugaz ocurre en su casa, y cuando abre los ojos, se encuentra con la heroína principal de 'Celestia', Sofía...

"Machino... siempre quise decirlo... me gustas."

¡La comedia romántica de harén de invocación a otro mundo comienza con las heroínas de alta simpatía que han saltado al mundo real!

description.en:
A space-time that gets weirder as you keep reading.
The tense dialogue between a professor and her assistant in a laboratory brimming with fishy knowledge.
What will the "Plan of the Renaissance of the Human Mind" bring forth?

altTitles.en: Scissor Seven: Black and White Twin Dragons 2

description.en: Sequel to [Wu Liu Qi: Heibai Shuanglong](https://mangadex.org/title/757ffc27-5baf-40c3-9bad-3a1859837936)
description.zh: 不良少年莫浪和高冷天才白其在居住的村庄遇到了神秘刺客,彻底颠覆了他 们的认知和生活。于是两人两人踏上了冒险之路。在与斯特国的较量中,莫 浪身受重伤,白其也在爆炸之中不知去向。当莫浪养好伤之后开始寻找白 其,根据线索他来到了石更国。在这里等着他的,除了那些强壮的新敌人, 还有一个来自斯特国的,似曾相识的人...

altTitles.ja: 幼女無双 ～仲間に裏切られた召喚師、魔族の幼女になって【英霊召喚】で溺愛スローライフを送る～

altTitles.ja-ro: Youjo Musou: Nakama ni Uragirareta Shoukanshi, Mazoku no Oujo ni Natte "Eirei Shoukan" de Dekiai Slow Life wo Okuru

altTitles.en: Unparalleled Little Girl: A Summoner Betrayed by Friends, Become a Demon Little Girl, and Live a Doting Slow Life with "Summoning of the Spirits"

description.en: Lilith, the summoner who accompanied the hero party, was betrayed during the battle with the demons and suffered a serious injury because she refused the invitation of the hero. Helped by her demons, she cannot return to the country in a detour, so she decides to become a demon at the recommendation of Astaroth, the four demon kings who helped her. However, she made a slight mistake and she turned into a little girl. Even if she becomes a little girl, her magical power is not the same, but powers up! Summon the spirits and make an outstanding performance in battle and slow life!

To achieve their goal of traveling back to the past, three adventurers that usually spend their time fighting monsters are ready to do anything to achieve it! Including becoming workers at a... daycare...?

Marin, a caretaker from the Dream Management Bureau, works with Bakuo, a Dream Tapir, to turn young girls' nightmares into sweet dreams. Perhaps they'll come to visit you at your pillow tonight...? A heartwarming dreamy fantasy!

altTitles.en: I Like These Kind of Stories

title.en: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun: If Episode of Mafia

altTitles.en: Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun (Mafia Alternate Universe)

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん if Episode of 魔フィア

altTitles.en: Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun: If Episode of Mafia

altTitles.vi: Iruma Giá Đáo!: IF Episode of MAFIA

description.en: The beloved characters of Mairimashita! Iruma-kun star in this Mafia-based spinoff! Young Iruma saves an injured mob boss from death... and then becomes his grandson!?
description.ja: 暴力や犯罪は当たり前の貧民街-スラム-で育った心優しい少年・イルマ。瀕死状態で倒れていた、マフィア組織【バビル】のドン・サリバンを助けたことで、イルマの運命の歯車が動き出す！ マフィア組織【バビル】を中心に巻き起こる、マフィア・アクションコメディ！
description.vi: Spin-Off của tác phẩm"Mairimashita! Iruma-kun" theo hướng What-If, thế giới của tác phẩm lần này sẽ xoay quanh việc các nhân vật sẽ sống trong thế giới của các Mafia
description.es-la: ¡Un spin-off oficial de Mairimashita! Iruma-kun, en un universo alternativo en el que Iruma se convierte en un destacado miembro de la mafia. A pesar de tener sólo cinco años, Iruma ha visto muchas cosas como niño de la calle... ¡la más reciente, a un anciano desangrándose justo delante de donde vive! Como buen chico, Iruma se dedica a curar al anciano y no le da importancia. Sin embargo, cuando el anciano regresa de repente, se revela como Don Sullivan, ¡jefe de la organización clandestina conocida como Babyls! Se ofrece a adoptar a Iruma como su nieto, una oferta que Iruma se ve incapaz de rechazar...

description.en: The daily life of a group of students that have superpowers...

title.en: Nani ka Ii no Mitsuketa! Re:

altTitles.ja: 何かいいの見つけた! Re:

description.en:
This is the sequel to the story Nani ka Ii no Mitsuketa!

After stomach cramps land Muramachi Koharu in a bed at the nurse's office on the very first day at his new school, he suddenly wakes up to find himself on the landing just before the roof door. And there's a student he doesn't know sitting right next to him!

"Where am I? Who are you?"

The student says he's one year Koharu's senior and he leans closer and closer to him…! He pushes Koharu down… and suddenly kisses him!

Yuuya starts his dream of living alone. Then Sera, a famous beautiful girl at school and his self-proclaimed ex-girlfriend, and her younger sister Rise rush in. In order for the three of them to be self-sufficient, an exciting life together begins where they grow vegetables in their home garden and eat delicious food!

title.en: The Reincarnated Assassin Is a Swordmaster

altTitles.es-la: El asesino reencarnado es un genio de la espada

description.en:
Raon was once a loyal assassin for House Robert until Derus killed him. Not willing to give up, Raon prayed for vengeance and woke as a member of House Sieghart, the most powerful noble house!

He’ll need all of their near-infinite resources to get revenge. Though he carried over knowledge of a powerful Flame Link technique, he also carries the Curse of Bitter Frost, something that’s slowly killing him.

As if that weren’t enough, the demonic embodiment of Wrath is trying to take over his body!?
description.zh:
拉昂的一生就像一条拴着锁链的狗。
然而，造化弄人，他获得了新生
--即使他的怒火依然留在断裂的锁链之中。
终于能够自立，他决定按照自己的意愿生活。
“我会杀死一切阻挡我的人，神也不例外。”

description.en:
Kinnikuman (Muscleman), a weak and clumsy super hero, constantly getting into wacky situations. As the series progressed, the story began changing from comedy to action as Kinnikuman battles stronger and stronger foes in the wrestling ring. The series continually introduced new Super Human characters, known as Chojin, who would challenge Kinnikuman and his friends for various purposes.  
    
---
- **The initial serialization lasted from 1979-1986 and ended with Vol. 36. The series directly continued in 2011 with Vol. 37.**
- **The 2011 Chapters resets the Count to 1 during it set of volumes (Beyond Vol 36)**

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 1985**
description.pt-br:
Kinnikuman (Homem Músculo), um super-herói fraco e desajeitado, constantemente entrando em situações malucas. À medida que a série avançava, a história começou a mudar de comédia para ação, enquanto Kinnikuman lutava contra inimigos cada vez mais fortes no ringue de luta livre. A série continuamente introduziu novos personagens Super Humanos, conhecidos como Chojin, que desafiariam Kinnikuman e seus amigos para vários propósitos. 

A serialização original foi de 1979-1986 e terminou com o Vol. 36. A série continuou diretamente em 2010. 

Ganhou o Shogakukan Manga Awards por melhor Shounen em 1985.
